data.lyric:
[ti:Unforgettable (Explicit)]
[ar:French Montana/Swae Lee]
[al:Jungle Rules]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Unforgettable (Explicit) - French Montana/Swae Lee
[00:05.92]Written by：Karim Kharbouch/Khalif Brown/Michael L. Williams II/Christopher Washington/McCulloch Reid Sutphin/Aujla Jagvir Singh
[00:11.84]It's not good enough for me
[00:13.19]
[00:14.36]Since I've been with you ooh
[00:17.06]
[00:21.59]It's not gonna work for you
[00:22.98]
[00:24.13]Nobody can equal me I know
[00:26.56]
[00:30.52]I'm gonna sip on this drink when I'm f**ked up
[00:32.91]I should know how to pick up
[00:34.07]
[00:35.21]I'm gonna catch the rhythm
[00:36.71]While she push up against me ooh is she tipsy
[00:39.11]
[00:41.10]I had enough convo for 24
[00:43.56]
[00:44.98]I peep'd you from across the room
[00:46.69]Pretty little body dancin' like GoGo hey
[00:48.93]
[00:50.00]And you are unforgettable
[00:52.19]
[00:53.40]I need to get you alone oeh
[00:57.41]
[00:58.77]Why not a f**kin' good time never hurt nobody
[01:01.87]I got a little drink but it's not Bacardi
[01:04.28]If you loved the girl then I'm so so sorry
[01:06.70]I gotta give it to her like we in a marriage
[01:08.97]
[01:09.83]Oh like we in a hurry
[01:12.01]No no I won't tell nobody
[01:13.86]
[01:14.67]You're on your level too
[01:16.29]

[01:18.69]

[01:20.70]

[01:23.13]

[01:25.57]

[01:28.52]Ride ride with me boss
[01:31.29]I got a hard head but her a** soft
[01:33.09]
[01:33.70]She want the last name with the ring on it
[01:35.96]'Cause I pulled out a million cash told her plank on it
[01:38.01]

[01:41.04]
